articles.title: Man arrested over burglary at Ben Stokes's home
articles.description: A man is arrested following a burglary at England cricket captain Ben Stokes's home, police said.
articles.content:
A man has been arrested following a burglary at England cricket captain Ben Stokes's home, police have said.

articles.title: Warner's leadership ban lifted by Cricket Australia
articles.description: David Warner's lifetime leadership ban is lifted by Cricket Australia, leaving him free to captain in domestic cricket.
articles.content:

articles.title: Sri Lanka's Jayawickrama handed one-year ban
articles.description: Sri Lanka spinner Praveen Jayawickrama handed a one-year ban from all forms of cricket for breaching the anti-corruption code, the International Cricket Council (ICC) said.
articles.content:
